remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序使用适用于所有用户、 独立应用于单个用户的配置和应用于漫游用户配置的全局配置。Client applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users. `userLevel`参数确定是否不具有用户级别 （配置文件位于与应用程序相同的目录中） 通过指示所打开的配置文件的位置或每用户级别 (正在配置文件应用程序设置路径由用户级别）。The `userLevel` parameter determines the location of the configuration file being opened by indicating whether it has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by the user level). 指定要获取通过传递以下值之一的配置值`userLevel`:Specify which configuration to get by passing one of the following values for `userLevel`: - 若要获取适用于所有用户的对象集`userLevel`到。To get the object that applies to all users, set `userLevel` to . - 若要获取本地适用于当前用户的对象集`userLevel`到。To get the local object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to . - 若要获取漫游适用于当前用户的对象集`userLevel`到。To get the roaming object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to . > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限上设置它继承的所有配置文件。To get the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新配置文件，你的代码还必须具有写入访问权限的配置文件和它所在的目录。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method.
